page.title: 02SHOPS AND PRICES
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF BATTLE CONTAINS A LOT OF{SHOPS}WHICH ARE USED MAINLY BY LOCAL PEOPLE RATHER THAN TOURISTS. MOST OF THE FOOD SHOPS ARE LOCATED ON THE HIGH STREET. THESE INCLUDE A SMALL SUPERMARKET, A BAKERS, SEVERAL BUTCHERS AND GREENGROCERS, AND A DELICATESSEN. THERE IS NOT A GREAT DEAL OF COMPETITION BETWEEN THE SHOPS SO PRICES TEND TO BE A LITTLE HIGHER THAN IN LARGE SUPERMARKETS. MOST OF THE SHOPKEEPERS HAVE THEIR REGULAR CUSTOMERS WHO HAVE SHOPPED THERE FOR YEARS AND WHOM THEY KNOW BY NAME.MANY SHOPPERS TOLD US THAT THEY DID NOT MIND THE SLIGHTLY HIGHER PRICES BECAUSE THEY DID NOT LIKE THE BUSY SHOPS IN HASTINGS, RESENTED TRAVELLING, AND FOUND BATTLE SHOPKEEPERS TRUSTWORTHY AND RELIABLE.
